text: Yann-Fañch Kemener (April 7, 1957 – March 16, 2019) was a French traditional singer-songwriter. He was born in Sainte-Tréphine (Côtes-d'Armor), France. He took part in reviving Kan ha diskan () in the 1970s and 1980s, especially with Erik Marchand. He wrote songs from the oral tradition in the Breton language.Yann-Fañch Kemener - Biographie chronologique von Jérémie Pierre Jouan (http://www.kemener.com/celtic.htm ) Kemener died in Tréméven on March 16, 2019 at age 61. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:1957 births Category:2019 deaths Category:French singer-songwriters
title: Yann-Fañch Kemener
